short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This lightweight extension simply adds a right-click context menu item for opening optimized GIFs with gfycat.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Animated GIFs can be a pain to load. gfycat.com helps solve this by converting the gif into an optimized HTML5 format. This unofficial extension simply adds a context menu item to images and links on the page so that you can have the option of opening the GIF in a new tab with gfycat.com/fetch.
